author: craigmcc
msg: Place both Subscribe and Unsubscribe links to the mailing lists on the
main page of the documentation application (and therefore the main page of
the Struts web site next time it is updated).

author: craigmcc
msg: Add release notes for 1.0-b3 (up to date with current changes).

author: craigmcc
msg: Port the fixes for attribute minimization to the HEAD branch.

author: craigmcc
msg: Oops, missed <html:radio> on the attribute minimization fix.

author: craigmcc
msg: Replace all occurrences of generating HTML with "attribute minimization"
attributes) with corresponding constructs such as 'checked="true"'.  This
still works fine in current generation browsers, but is more friendly to
XML and XHTML oriented output pages.
